ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day the Hour arrives the evildoers will be in despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day the Resurrection comes the sinners will be overwhelmed with despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On that Day when the Hour will come to pass, the criminals shall be dumbfounded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the day when the Hour of Doom comes, the criminals will despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And on the Last Day– when it is established, the guilty* will lose all hope. (* The disbelievers.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And on the Day when the Hour will be established, the criminals will be plunged into destruction with despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And at the time when the hour shall come the guilty shall be in despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day when the Hour is come, the sinners shall be confounded
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And in the day when the Hour riseth the unrighteous will despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On the Day the Hour arrives, the guilty will be struck dumb with despair,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And on the day whereon the Hour arriveth, dumb-struck will be the culprits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And when the Hour sets in, the guilty will despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: On the Day that the Hour will be established, the guilty will be struck dumb with despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And on the Day when the Hour will be established, the Mujrimun (disbelievers, sinners, criminals, polytheists, etc.) will be plunged into destruction with deep regrets, sorrows, and despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On the Day when the Hour comes, the wrongdoers will be speechless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On the Day when the Hour takes place, the guilty will despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the Day the Hour appears the criminals will be in despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [30:12] And on the Day when the Hour comes, the sinners will be dumbfounded, the idolaters will be fall into silence, as their [line of] argument can no longer be continued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And in the day when the Hour) which is the Day of Judgement (riseth the criminals will despair) the idolaters will despair of any good.
